column4: Silonijan - Culvert Approach Road Damaged | Due to heavy rain and over flow water of Kalyani River on 28/07/2022 culvert no 18/1(lenth:260 sqm) & 18/2(length :135 sqm) on Chowkihola to Arlongwoti Road at Chekbare Village was damaged, under PWD Barpathar Road Division under Silonijan Rev. Circle PS -Chokihola, Coordinates are Lat:26.404671, Long:93.61309 & : Lat: 26.405264,Long : 93.612185
